title: Dakcrypto
author: Dakcrypto
content: I woke up this morning to find this update, I thought it was a joke untill I tried to communicate but discovered some people got a temporary suspicious tag. The update of new CAPTCHA is tough and it seems almost impossible to win, but the reason behind this will yearned result by the end of 24 hrs. If shit posts are reduce it will be a great joy for Mr. @Theymos and Co, I don't know if am speaking the mind of others but for me the captcha is too much even google captcha is not as hard as this new CAPTCHA. I will love to plead to an extent that CAPTCHA CHALLENGE should be reduce because some of us here are really going to leave the forum if it doesn't stop. Both snr colleagues couldn't finish it, how about newbies? Anyway game lovers stand a big chance to win the challenge and I hope there will be a reward for those who will win and those that won it already

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Why should it be on the Bitcoin discussion board? Haven't you seen the meta board to discuss this April fool, I think it's enough to post in the thread that theymos created.This is clearly off-topic, better move it to > META.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: luckily TryNinja created the "anti-New CAPTCHA challenge" called [SCRIPT] New Captcha CRACKER by TryNinja The H4CK3R1337  to battle theymos's newly implemented feature on the forum. check the thread out and download it at your own risk if you are having a hard time finishing the challenge. let us know how it goes.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on April 01, 2023, 03:32:34 PMThis is clearly off-topic, better move it to > META.Yea, it is. I would have advised the OP to move it to Meta or create the topic on Meta, but even if he/she wants to, he can't do that since he's still on Junior Member Rank. He could probably move it to beginners and help or off-topic as an alternate since that's the only two places it can be right now.@OP,  I don't know how you and others who are solving this are really doing it, as for me it's taking me more than I can ever imagine. The worst of it all is that I have to earn about 89 points before I can be declared as someone who has passed the captcha. I must confess that today is the most confiscated day among the other days that I have spent on this forum.

comments.author: Dakcrypto
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on April 01, 2023, 03:32:34 PMThis is clearly off-topic, better move it to > META. Thanks for your advice or COMMAND but tried to move but can't because am still a Jnr member, thou it has been automatically move to META. Quote from: acroman08 on April 01, 2023, 04:30:41 PMluckily TryNinja created the "anti-New CAPTCHA challenge" called [SCRIPT] New Captcha CRACKER by TryNinja The H4CK3R1337  to battle theymos's newly implemented feature on the forum. check the thread out and download it at your own risk if you are having a hard time finishing the challenge. let us know how it goes. I tried the Hack Patch it wasn't working but was kinda sick so I could update you on how it went, by the way thanks for your help.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Dakcrypto on April 03, 2023, 12:14:26 AMtried to move but can't because am still a Jnr member, thou it has been automatically move to META. As long as you can create a thread, you can move it, even as a newbie.You either do not know how to move it or tried to move it after it had been moved here by a mod, in which case you would not be able to.The option to 'move topic' is at the bottom left of any thread you create.
